Cognizant.content: Implemented Waterfall, Agile, and Rapid Application Development methodologies to complete projects in 90% of sprints. Developed and maintained enterprise web applications, utilizing Restful APIs and CDNs to achieve a 30% overall system performance boost.

Stige.content: Delivered 3 optimized website builds based on client wireframes, resulting in 95% client satisfaction. Collaborated with UX designers to ensure compatibility between design elements and APIs, ensuring product functionality.

IEEE GRIET SB.content: Headed the IEEE GRIET SB web development team. Took charge of the creation, operation, and the maintenance of the website
